TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CompilationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定义用于支持 Web 应用程序的编译基础结构的配置设置。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the compilation infrastructure of Web applications.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的节内容的方式 `compilation` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `compilation` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为部分的多个属性指定值 `compilation` ，该部分也可以作为类的成员进行访问 。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `compilation` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为节指定值 `compilation` 。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `compilation` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的成员 。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Compilation Overview
ASP.NET Precompilation Overview

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

value.span: 一个包含编译 ASP.NET 资源期间所使用的程序集对象的 。

span.span: A that contains the assembly objects used during compilation of an ASP.NET resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含在动态 ASP.NET 资源的编译过程中要使用的程序集引用。This property contains the assembly references to use during compilation of a dynamic ASP.NET resource. 在编译每个代码模块时，ASP.NET 会自动将这些程序集链接到资源。ASP.NET automatically links these assemblies to the resource when compiling each code module.

span.span: A string value specifying the post-process compilation step for an assembly.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否尝试批编译。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether batch compilation is attempted.

value.span: 如果尝试批编译，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if batch compilation is attempted; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此特性设置为 `true` ，以更改访问未编译的文件时所需编译导致的延迟。Set this attribute to `true` to change the delay caused by the required compilation when you access an uncompiled file. 将此属性设置为 `true` 指示 ASP.NET 以批处理模式预编译所有未编译的文件。Setting this attribute to `true` instructs ASP.NET to precompile all the uncompiled files in batch mode. 首次编译文件时会发生延迟;但是，在编译文件后，会消除延迟。A delay occurs when the files are first compiled; however once the files are compiled, the delay is eliminated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan BatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.BatchTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置批处理编译的超时期限（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示允许批处理编译进行的时间长度（以秒为单位）。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds granted for batch compilation to occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示批处理编译的超时期限（以秒为单位）。Indicates the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation. 如果编译无法在超时期限内完成，则编译器会恢复为当前页的单编译模式。If the compilation cannot be completed within the time-out period, the compiler reverts to single-compilation mode for the current page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置要在动态编译文件中使用的默认编程语言。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要在动态编译文件中使用的默认编程语言，如 c # 或 VB.NET。Specifies the default programming language, such as C# or VB.NET, to use in dynamic compilation files. 使用节定义语言名称 `system.codedom` 。Language names are defined using the `system.codedom` section. 默认编程语言为 `vb` ，它将 VB.NET 指定为默认编程语言。The default programming language is `vb`, which specifies VB.NET as the default programming language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 提取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 应用程序是否可以利用 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 预取功能。

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 应用程序可以利用 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 预取功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预提取是一个实用程序，旨在提高应用程序的启动性能，方法是在需要时将应用程序数据加载到内存中。Prefetch is a utility that is intended to improve application startup performance by loading application data into memory before it is demanded . > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]要使此设置生效，必须配置并运行预提取服务。The [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch service must be configured and running for this setting to be effective.

value.span: 如果启用 Visual Basic 编译选项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Visual Basic compile option is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 指定禁用 Visual Basic 编译选项。

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定 Microsoft Visual Basic 编译选项的设置 `explicit` 。This property specifies the setting of the Microsoft Visual Basic `explicit` compile option. 设置为时 `true` ，将 `explicit` 启用 Visual Basic 编译选项。When set to `true`, the Visual Basic `explicit` compile option is enabled. 启用该选项后，必须使用 `Dim` 、 `Private` 、 `Public` 或语句显式声明所有变量 `ReDim` 。When the option is enabled, all variables must be explicitly declared using a `Dim`, `Private`, `Public`, or `ReDim` statement. 默认为 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定每个成批编译生成的源文件的最大大小 (（kb) ）。Specifies the maximum size (in kilobytes) of the generated source files per batched compilation. 默认值为 1000 KB。The default value is 1000 KB. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序重新启动前可发生的资源的动态重新编译的次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 一个指示应用程序重新启动前可发生的资源的动态重新编译的次数的值。

span.span: A value indicating the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 默认为 15 次重新编译。

span.span: The default is 15 recompilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示在应用程序重新启动之前可发生的资源的动态重新编译数。Indicates the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts. 全局和应用程序配置级别支持此属性，但不支持在目录配置级别。This attribute is supported at the global and application configuration levels, but not at the directory configuration level. > [!NOTE] > 每次程序集失效时，ASP.NET 都会增加属性值，并且无法删除。ASP.NET increases the property value every time an assembly is invalidated and fails to be deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#15)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否针对所部署环境优化了应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application is optimized for the deployed environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 ，则 ASP.NET 编译系统会启用旨在提高 ASP.NET 启动性能的优化，从而降低 CPU 利用率。When this property is set to , the ASP.NET compilation system enables optimizations that are intended to speed up ASP.NET startup performance at the expense of increased CPU utilization. 此属性的默认设置为 。The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当时 `true` ，编译显式禁止发生数据丢失的任何数据类型转换，以及数值类型和字符串之间的任何转换。When `true`, compilation explicitly disallows any data-type conversions in which data loss would occur, and any conversion between numeric types and strings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何针对特定版本的 .NET Framework 的信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 项目 .NET Framework 多目标](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398791(v=vs.100))。For information about how to target a specific version of the .NET Framework, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398791(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [compilation 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s10awwz0(v=vs.100))[compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s10awwz0(v=vs.100))

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定要在编译期间用于临时文件存储的目录。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the directory to use for temporary file storage during compilation.

value.span: 一个指定要在编译期间用于临时文件存储的目录的值。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编译器指令使用物理路径还是 URL。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在配置中将此属性指定为 `true` ，则 url 将用于编译器说明，而不是物理路径。If this property is specified as `true` in the configuration, URLs will be used for the compiler instructions instead of physical paths. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
